Klasse JobPostService

java.lang.Object
com.spirit.application.service.JobPostService
@Service public class JobPostService extends Object
Service class for managing job postings.

      public List<JobPost> getJobPostByUnternehmenId(Long unternehmenId)
      Retrieves all job posts by a specific company.
      Parameter:
      unternehmenId - the ID of the company
      Gibt zurück:
      a list of job posts by the company

      Gibt zurück:

    • deleteJobPost

      @Transactional public void deleteJobPost(Long jobPostId)
      Deletes a specific job post and its associated applications.
      Parameter:
      jobPostId - the ID of the job post to delete

    • incrementViewCount

      @Transactional public void incrementViewCount(JobPost jobPost)
      Increments the view count of a specific job post.
      Parameter:
      jobPost - the job post whose view count is to be incremented

    • getViewCount

      public Long getViewCount(JobPost jobPost)
      Retrieves the view count of a specific job post.
      Parameter:
      jobPost - the job post whose view count is to be retrieved
      Gibt zurück:
      the view count

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if there are any job posts.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if there are no job posts, false otherwise
